name: Kite Quest
description:
Need an escape?

You're flying your kite like any other day.

Suddenly dinosaur bones fall from the sky.

Time to extract the minerals.

---

I'm so excited to release Kite Quest, Version 1. It's my first game after starting game dev one year ago. The goal is to bring open world exploration to casual mobile gamers. Think Zelda meets Egg, Inc.

Help make the game great! All feedback welcome.
